story_arceus_02_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I am Rose, chairman of the Galar region’s
Pokémon League!
story_arceus_02_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I’m sure you’ve all been waiting for today’s
match!
story_arceus_02_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Leon, the strongest Champion ever to grace the
Galar region...
story_arceus_02_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
will be battling the living legend of Kanto, Red, in
the showdown of the century!
story_arceus_02_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
These sync pairs are the best of the best, and
both boast a strong bond with their Charizard!
story_arceus_02_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
A match between these two pairs will surely be
etched into Pasio’s history!
story_arceus_02_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Red... The spectators weren’t the only ones
waiting for this moment.
story_arceus_02_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I’ve always hoped to battle you and see who
comes out on top!
story_arceus_02_01000/2401_1101_1200_20:
Both competitors are calmly staring each
other down.
story_arceus_02_01000/2401_1001_1400_10:
You’re much stronger than I thought! No easy
opponent, that’s for sure...
story_arceus_02_01000/2401_1001_1500_10:
But...that’s why we want to beat you and your
Charizard!
story_arceus_02_01000/2401_1001_1700_10:
What an outstanding battle! And they’re
evenly matched!
story_arceus_02_01000/2401_1001_1800_10: (At this rate, we’ll just slowly tire each other out.)
story_arceus_02_01000/2401_1001_1900_10:
(I’d rather not let this drag on any longer and
risk a tie!)
story_arceus_02_01000/2401_1001_2000_10: Time to take this straight to the finale! Charizard!
story_arceus_02_01000/2401_1101_2200_20:
The Gigantamax Charizard has unleashed a
scorching attack!
story_arceus_02_01000/2401_1101_2300_20: Was it enough to decide the match?!
story_arceus_02_01000/2401_1001_2600_10: That wasn’t enough to take them out?
story_arceus_02_01000/2401_1101_2900_20: Leon has fallen just one step short of victory!
story_arceus_02_01000/2401_1001_3100_10:
What a champion time it’s been! Thank you for the
greatest battle I’ve ever had!
story_arceus_02_01000/2401_1001_3300_10:
You’re a first-rate sync pair, all right. I offer you
my heartfelt congratulations!
